DOC.brief_title: Cronic Pressure Wounds and Relation With Gender
DOC.detailed_description: There is no exact scientific data about gender relationship with cronic pressure wounds (CPW). Researches about this subject is generally related to prevention and management of the process. But gender difference is not exactly researched in the literature. This research is aimed first to reveal gender relationship with CPW and aimed secondarily to reveal the gender related couse(es).
DOC.criteria: Cronic pressure wound patients Operated cronic pressure wounds
